metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0278 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
libuv before 0.10.34 does not properly drop group privileges, which allowscontext-dependent attackers to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0278` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libuv0.10 - 0.10.28-6ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libuv package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.28-6ubuntu1').
